I am a security consultant and need to know how to prevent a bank robber from escaping.

[ðŸ”’CLASSIC] As a security consultant, some measures to prevent a bank robber from escaping could include implementing advanced surveillance systems, securing all entry and exit points, having armed guards on-site, and utilizing technology like dye packs and GPS trackers in the money bags.
